Name: Hero Express
About the game: Hero Express is an atypical driving game. You won't be competing with other drivers to see who reaches the goal first, you will try hard to reach the goal ALIVE. Each track is filled with obstacles and hazards, and the player is the one that'll have to exploit his skill in this 2d physics-driven driving game. 11 Crazy Tracks 11 Unique Vehicles 4 Upgradable Stats 16 Different Hazards 2 Powerups 2 Difficulties Hero is really absent-minded and always forgets his heroic tools. Who will save the day when the hero needs saving? The Hero Express of course. And you are the best of the best, Delivery guy, the one sent on impossible missions. Help Hero save the world with your mad driving skills!
